description: A four member ensemble of coupled (AOGCM) simulations from 1850-2014 in which aerosol optical properties including cloud-radiation interactions are prescribed.  Aerosol forcings to be consistent with the historical forcing used in the DAMIP experiments.
keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, historical,  aerosol forcing, specified aerosol
long_name: RFMIP historical aerosol forcing with specified aerosols
rationale: To determine which aspects of the historical record robustly emerge from ensembles in which the radiative forcing by anthropogenic aerosols is tightly constrained.

requirements.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC

requirements.description: Historical aerosol optical properties including cloud-radiation interactions prescribed by RFMIP.  An analytically-described spatial pattern with time-constant spectral variation and time-varying strength (building on the Easy Aerosol experience).
